data.name: Story Of Eve 2
data.detailed_description:
ðŸ’ŸCHECK THIS OUT!ðŸ’Ÿ

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1964360/Sexy_Mystic_Survivors/?curator_clanid=41075428


About the Game

While on your journey to the Central Continent, Cassandra the succubus shared her plan to train Eve and strengthen her abilities.

After you both agree, Cassandra imparts Eve with the lewd mark of a succubus and sends the both of you into a dream world. You must guide Eve through her training as she explores this dream and battles enemies. Will you moderate her training and guide her down the right path? Or will you let her run wild and succumb to her desires...

Explore!

Venture out with an improved exploration system. Lead Eve through the maze-like levels and experience all sorts of events.

Battle!

Experience a new and improved version of the original card battle. featuring a new battle mechanic and a â™¥mysteriousâ™¥ fourth card type.

Strip!

Eve earns better gear and clothes as she gets stronger. Better clothes mean less fabric!

Train!

Through the power of the lewd mark, Eve's abilities (and H-scenes) increase as her training progresses.

Transform?


As you guide Eve through her training, you will find that as Eve gets stronger, she also becomes more assertive...

data.short_description: Guide Eve through a succubus training program in the newest "Story of Eve". Experience a new story with improved mechanics and even more outrageous training scenes and outfits!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Dual or AMD Equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Intel Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
For your information, all characters are aged 20 or above.

Content contains nudity and pornography, please make sure you are in the right place to avoid any unnecessary attention.
